title: black screen after champion select need help :s
body:
Hey guys
over the last month sometimes my league would go all black after champ select, but i stay conected and enter the game with sound, but no visual all i see is the hand pointer(mouse) and all is black, then it started to get more frequent and i´ve got  heavy afk penalties due to this.. and i´ve never had b4 any.. now is all the time, i cant spectate or create customs  
 i´ve tryed a lot of things to fix this but i cant find or figure out the solution, anyone had/has the same problem ? or know the solution?
would be very grattefull 
thanks

replies.body: A black screen with sound is usually due a hardware issue improperly rendering the game.  I recommend updating your graphics card driver as well as following the steps found in our [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) guide.
